sourcesContent:
import React,{ Component } from "react"; import axios from 'axios'; export default class Product extends Component{ constructor(props){ super(props); this.state = { post_slug : this.props.match.params.slug, post_data : [], images: [], price : 0, new_price : 0, has_discount : false, discount : 0 } } static defaultProps = { apiUrl : 'http://localhost/my-app1/' }; componentDidMount = async () =>{ const data= new FormData(); data.append('get_post_by_slug', 'true'); data.append('slug', this.state.post_slug); const config = { method: 'post', url: this.props.apiUrl, headers:{}, data : data }; const datas = await axios(config) const postData = datas.data; this.setState({ post_data : postData }); const images = []; for(let key in postData.metas.images){ let row = postData.metas.images[key]; images.push(row); } let price = postData.metas.price, discount = postData.metas.discount, discount_start_date = new Date(postData.metas.discount_start_date), discount_end_date = new Date(postData.metas.discount_end_date), now_date = new Date(), calc_discount = (price * (100 - discount)) / 100; let has_discount = (discount_start_date <= now_date && discount_end_date >= now_date) ? true : false; let new_price = (has_discount) ? calc_discount : null; this.setState({ images : images, has_discount : has_discount, discount : discount, new_price : new_price, price : price }) } render(){ const{post_data,images,price,discount,has_discount,new_price}=this.state; console.log(has_discount); return(
    { images.map(image =>{ return(
    • ) }) }
